education.description: Graduated with Distinction. Here I took my Degree of Computer Science with a Software Developement Specialty and achieved a much more through education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion
Here I took my high School Degree with a Physics Specialty and improved my English language by participating the scholarship of Access Program and get a certificate give by the USA Embassy.

testimonials.text: I have worked with Tawfik for one project and he must be one of the good developers. It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time! .
